website_summaries.verdict: Versatile coverage with custom color that perfectly matches any skin tone.
pros: Provides sheer-to-medium cover and feels very airy on the skin
Lasts all day and won't wipe off
Unique bead formula keeps the foundation from breaking down
cons: Does not provide very effective coverage for acne or birthmarks

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to have it delivered!
customer_reviews.text: I love the entire Jane Iredale brand. This particular item is a foundation that is almost translucent. It’s very light, but covers smoothly and evenly. The little bulbs are smashed in the dispensing process, and they release something good to work synergistically on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ardith

customer_reviews.title: did not blend in my skin like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: did not blend in my skin like I thought it would. I could tell I was wearing cover up. I am looking for a product that will make my face look like I am not wearing makeup, especially wear I live.Summers are between 90 to 110
customer_reviews.author: Norma Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use Jane Iredale products because of the quality of the ingredients, they are GOOD for my skin. I used to model and at 67 years of age I still have great skin......"smooth as a baby's butt" as they say. I'm usually mistaken for 10-15 years younger than my actual age. I've been blessed with good genes. Think of this as an investment in yourself that will continue paying dividends!!
customer_reviews.author: janis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used Jane Iredale Liquid Minerals for years! The only foundation I will ever use!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great
customer_reviews.text: Using it for 3 years now, blends well to my skin tone and brings a natural glow.
customer_reviews.author: shailee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCTS. LIGHT BASE YET HAS GOOD COVERAGE. LOOKS LIKE YOU ARE NOT WEARING ANY MAKE-UP.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mineral make up ever, looks completely natural. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue  Zoch

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foundation for years. It's the best, it gives a light, natural coverage with a dewy glow that lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It works really well
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It works really well, and it's not oily.
customer_reviews.author: LRD

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dewey
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foundation. Keeps my skin looking dewey and is easy on the wrinkles. Its about the same price in the beauty supply but it saves me a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: top of the line foundation product.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this product and yields a fine foundation and natural tone to match one's on skin. We have ordered it over and over again and the small container lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: metman4u

customer_reviews.title: mineral foundation
customer_reviews.text: Really crazy about the coverage and the moisturizing properties. I also am very pleased with the container, there is no waste. You use every last bit of foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Chicmom

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Evrything as it should be!My wife using this product for second year and I found it much cheaper on Amazon that here in Europe shops are selling. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pegi

customer_reviews.title: Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this make up. Have to use a makeup brush.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lovin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. ..very happy with the price too :-)
customer_reviews.author: maggie amador

customer_reviews.title: Many Advantages!
customer_reviews.text: It is advantageous for me to apply this to my ordinary life schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Connell

customer_reviews.title: Jane Iredale's Liquid Minerals
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale's Liquid Minerals is a wonderful product to use if you have sensitive skin. For years, I used over the counter brands from high dollar department stores and my skin never looked or felt the way that I thought it should have for the amount of money invested.Jane Iredale Liquid Minerals come out of the pump "lumpy", but I pump a little on the top of my hand, rub the mineral bubbles a little, then apply with my fingers. The results are always fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: R. Guzman

product_meta.title: jane iredale Liquid Minerals A Foundation, 1.01 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Color:LatteA serum with pigment that provides sheer to medium coverage. Provides hydration, diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, minimizes the appearance pores, evens out skin tone and adheres so well, there is minimal transference. Liquid Minerals has no rated SPF. The beads or spheres visible in the airless pump are actually liposomes encapsulating liposomes. State-of-the-art technology prevents active ingredients from degrading and allows actives to time release into the skin.

BRAND STORY
Jane Iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
